{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Micro Development Board |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mangopi.org/mqr |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = MangoPi |model = MPi-MQ1 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = RDW2 |revision = (V1.0-220630) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;T113-S3; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Allwinner;T113-S3;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (Type-C), MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C) Female
|serial = yes,, via GPIO header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, RGB LCD FPC, DVP Camera Interface, Bluetooth 4.2, Microphone, GPIO |addchip = 1.2MHz White LED Driver;AeroSemi;MT9284;;1;,,, Filterless Class-D Mono Audio Amplifier;Diodes Inc;PAM8301;;1;,,, 100mA Low Dropout CMOS Voltage Regulator;Torex;XC6206;;2;,,, 1A 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8008;;2; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2022 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0BMFDB4M3 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723DS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MangoPi x AWOL", "MQ-R", "V1.0-220630" and "MANGOPI" :are silkscreened on the board top. "RISC-V" and "mangopi.cc" :are silkscreened on the board bottom.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] [https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/02/13/allwinner-t113-s3-dual-core-cortex-a7-soc-features-128mb-ddr3-targets-automotive-and-industrial-applications/ T113-S3] @1.0GHz :Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A7) + HiFi4 DSP *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Memory: 128MB (DDR3) SDRAM SIP *Wi-Fi: [[Realtek]] RTL8723DS :802.11bgn (1T1R) + Bluetooth 4.2 *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (Type-C) Host, :1x USB 2.0 (Type-C) OTG ports *GPIO: 2x 18-pin connector *Power Source: 5V via USB Type-C
==See also== :;[[MangoPi]] • [[List of SBCs]] *[[MangoPi MQ1W]] • [[Allwinner]] • [https://github.com/mangopi-sbc/MQ Spec.] *[[MangoPi MQ1RDW2]] • [[Allwinner]] *[[MangoPi MQ Pro (1GB)]] • [[Allwinner]] *[[MangoPi MQ Pro (512MB)]] • [[Allwinner]] *[[MangoPi MQ Quad]] • [[Allwinner]] • [https://habr.com/ru/post/686520/ Spec.] *[[MangoPi MCore H616]] •
[[Category:English Documentation]]
